owl:Ontology.dc:title: Friend of a Friend (FOAF) vocabulary
owl:Ontology.dc:description: The Friend of a Friend (FOAF) RDF vocabulary, described using W3C RDF Schema and the Web Ontology Language.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: personal mailbox
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A personal mailbox, ie. an Internet mailbox associated with exactly one owner, the first owner of this mailbox. This is a 'static inverse functional property', in that there is (across time and change) at most one individual that ever has any particular value for foaf:mbox.
